student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi! Did you know the Eiffel Tower is in Paris, France? It’s really tall—over 300 meters!
Wow! That is very tall. Have you visited it?
Yes, I have! It’s amazing to see up close. You can take an elevator or climb stairs to the top for a great view of Paris. Have you ever thought about visiting?
Yes, I want to visit one day. It sounds exciting!
That’s great! When you visit, make sure to go at night. The tower lights up and sparkles every hour—it’s so beautiful! Do you know it was built in 1889 for a big fair?
No, I did not know that. That is very interesting! It is very old.

Yes, it’s over 130 years old! It’s amazing how it’s still standing and loved by so many people. I hope you get to visit soon and see it for yourself—it’s truly unforgettable! Let me know if you want more tips for your trip!
Thank you! I will ask if I need help.
Good job! You’ve completed the task. Talk to you later! Have a great day! 😊
